parameters: \c[2]Zheng Ming \c[0]Did you forget? You fainted near the funeral shed.
\c[2]Zheng Ming \c[0]You scared the living hell out of me.
\c[2]Zheng Ming \c[0]Luckily, the clinic is nearby. The doctor examined you and said you fell asleep.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Iâm sorry. I had this problem since I was a kid...
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Iâm sorry for making your worried...
\c[2]Zheng Ming \c[0]Itâs okay. Captain Lu told me about your condition.
\c[2]Zheng Ming \c[0]Don't take it to heart, take your time to adjust to your work.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]By the way, do you have any news about the fire at the funeral?
\c[2]Zheng Ming \c[0]I had asked the person-in-charge. It was caused by a half-burned paper that had fallen onto a wreath.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]But I've investigated the scene, the fire started from inside the coffin.
\c[2]Zheng Ming \c[0]Thatâs impossible. The coffin was closed.
\c[2]Zheng Ming \c[0]Additionally, the person-in-charge did not pursue the case. He didnât even know who called the police.
\c[2]Zheng Ming \c[0]Some mischievous kid probably did it.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Was no one else at the scene during the incident?
\c[2]Zheng Ming \c[0]Yeah, the deceased was the owner of the small store,\c[1] Wang Jincai\c[0]. He got divorced a few years ago.
\c[2]Zheng Ming \c[0]The man was very stingy, his relatives stopped contacting him a long time ago.
\c[2]Zheng Ming \c[0]No one cared about his death, so residents in town pitied him.
\c[2]Zheng Ming \c[0]They donated some money to hold a funeral for him.
\c[2]Zheng Ming \c[0]Lixun, donât trouble yourself with this case. Go and get some rest.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]The doctor isn't here, what's the matter...?
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Hello? How can I help you?
The person on the other end hung up.
Thereâs nothing wrong with the phone.
Thereâs nothing wrong with the phone.
The door is covered with a thick layer of spider webs.
The door is covered with a thick layer of spider webs.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Maybe there is a way to clean up the spider webs.
The spider web is surprisingly tough.
A bag of IV solution is hanging on the infusion stand.
When I was a kid, I used to get these random fevers frequently. The doctors at the hospital could not find the cause of it.
My grandma knew a shaman. She said I was born at a Yin date at a Yin time, so I attract spirits naturally.
The last time I saw the shaman was at Dadâs funeral.
She sighed when she saw me and said a few words.
'Itâs heavenâs will that you can see ghost. You will become a policeman and help the dead finds justice.'
A bag of IV solution is hanging on the infusion stand.
'The following news report is about a local case...'
'On September 15th, a family of four in Qingtan Town\c[1] was found dead at home\c[0]...'
'The houseowner, Mr. Tian, his wife and granddaughter had \c[1]died from rat poison\c[0]. His daughter-in-law, Zhao had \c[1]hung herself\c[0].'
'The police force suspect that Zhao who had \c[1]a mental health issue\c[0], had poisoned the family and hung herself...'
'The case is under further investigation and we welcome any information from the public...'
There is a key next to the TV.
The news is playing on the TV.
'There is a strange rumor about the \c[1]Tian Family Murder Case\c[0]...'
'According to the town's residents, \c[1]on the seventh day\c[0] after the murder, residents with landlines received a call in the middle of the night...'
'\c[1]On the other side, there were sounds of a rope tightening, as if a heavy object was being hung\c[0]â¦'
'The number displayed was from \c[1]the Public Phone Market\c[0] owned by the Tian Family...'
'In response to this, the police has stated it was a rumor and urged people not to spread it...'
The local news is playing on the TV.
